TopicTitle: Mini Badass Space Ship (Download)(Compitable With .13 And Above)

Articles.Content:
Hello World! Today Me And My Friend(Chocolate13) Built This Small (AWESOME) Space Ship And I Tested It And Got This Results:

M/s: 2700 M/s

Meters From The Launch Pad: 1.050.000

That Is Kinda Amazing For A Newb Builded Mini-Ship(I Think),If Youre Skilled Enough Maybe You\'l Make It To The Mun(Not Back Tough). If You Aren\'t A Skilled Driver Then Use Our Built-In S.A.S System!

 =======================Fast Guide To The Mini Badass Space Ship=======================

Take Off: Option 1. Throttle Up To 100 And Go

 Option 2. Throttle Up, Press T And Then Hit Space(Hit Space On Option One Too!)

Engine 1: When You Run Out Of Fuel Just Drop The First Stage.

Engine 2:When You Run Out Of Fuel Just Drop The Second Stage.

Engine 3:When You Run Out Of Fuel Just Drop The Third Stage.

Just Do The Same Until You Come To The Commando Pod, When You Come There Wait Until You Are (Don\'t Get The Parachute To Jump Out Yet) Falling Into The Surface And When You Fall Press space Again And Wait(Tip: Wait until you are at 4000 before you press space the last time)

Goal: Get Into Orbit(Atleast 400.000 Meters) And Then Land On The Homeplanet Again In One Piece(with only the pod left)

Extra Mission: Reach Mun (If You Get There Take(Or Make A Video)Screenshot Of When You Landed)

P.S My Friend Deleted The Old one So I Maked A New One

Greetings, and welcome to the KSP forums.

Sadly, I don\'t see a way for this ship to reach a 70 km 0Â° inclination orbit, let alone a 400 km orbit. Specifically, I\'m getting a paper ?V of 3931 m/s, when it takes ~4400 m/s to reach low orbit in the best case. Less efficient trajectories and ships need 4500-5000 m/s. Vertical performance testing gets me at most ~1650 m/s at burnout. I\'m guessing that the earlier version had an additional stage?

As such, I\'m proposing a revised design:

![mbss2.png](http://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c128/raptor_87/KSP/mbss2.png)

It needs to be throttled down for much the its flight for maximum efficiency (despite shedding engines), but is capable of reaching LKO and returning safely. vertically stacking additional fuel tanks would greatly increase its ?V budget.
